framework.name: PCI DSS
framework.description: Security controls for payment card data environments.

domains.name: Data Protection
domains.description: Protect stored and transmitted card data.

controls.title: Network security controls
controls.summary_description: Install and maintain network security controls to protect card data environments.
controls.implementation_guidance: Document firewall rules, segmentation, and approve changes.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review firewall rules
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate rules for PCI scope boundaries.

controls.title: Secure configurations
controls.summary_description: Apply secure configuration standards for system components.
controls.implementation_guidance: Use hardened baselines and monitor configuration drift.

suggested_task_templates.title: Validate secure configurations
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm baseline adherence for PCI systems.

controls.title: Protect stored cardholder data
controls.summary_description: Securely store and limit retention of cardholder data.
controls.implementation_guidance: Encrypt stored data and define retention schedules.

controls.title: Encrypt transmission
controls.summary_description: Encrypt cardholder data during transmission over open networks.
controls.implementation_guidance: Use strong encryption protocols and validate certificates.

suggested_task_templates.title: Validate transmission encryption
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm TLS configurations for PCI data flows.

controls.title: Malware protection
controls.summary_description: Protect systems against malware and monitor for threats.
controls.implementation_guidance: Deploy endpoint protection and review alerts.

controls.title: Secure development
controls.summary_description: Develop and maintain secure systems and applications.
controls.implementation_guidance: Apply secure coding practices and vulnerability remediation SLAs.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review secure SDLC controls
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate code review and scanning coverage.

controls.title: Access control
controls.summary_description: Restrict access to cardholder data by business need-to-know.
controls.implementation_guidance: Implement RBAC and monitor privileged access.

controls.title: Identify and authenticate access
controls.summary_description: Assign unique IDs and strong authentication.
controls.implementation_guidance: Require MFA and monitor authentication failures.

controls.title: Log and monitor
controls.summary_description: Track and monitor access to network resources and card data.
controls.implementation_guidance: Centralize logs and review security events.

suggested_task_templates.title: Weekly log review
suggested_task_templates.description: Review PCI system logs and alerts.

controls.title: Test security
controls.summary_description: Test security controls and vulnerability management regularly.
controls.implementation_guidance: Perform penetration tests and vulnerability scans.

suggested_task_templates.title: Schedule penetration test
suggested_task_templates.description: Plan and execute annual PCI penetration test.

controls.title: Security policy and training
controls.summary_description: Maintain a security policy and training program.
controls.implementation_guidance: Publish policies and run annual training.

suggested_task_templates.title: Annual security training
suggested_task_templates.description: Assign and track PCI awareness training.
